name: Suspicious Files in Default GPO Folder
description: Detects the creation of copy of suspicious files (EXE/DLL) to the default GPO storage folder
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*\\Policies\\\{31B2F340\-016D\-11D2\-945F\-00C04FB984F9\}\\* AND file.path:(*.dll OR *.exe))`
